issues.description: Old-style uppercase keywords (ENTITY, PORT, END) instead of lowercase
suggestions: Use lowercase keywords: 'entity', 'port', 'end' for modern VHDL style
issues.reasoning: Modern VHDL style conventions prefer lowercase keywords. Uppercase keywords are outdated and reduce code readability.

issues.description: Missing spaces around colons in port declarations
suggestions: Add spaces around colons: 'a : in' instead of 'a:in'
Add spaces around colons: 'y : out' instead of 'y:out'
issues.reasoning: VHDL style guidelines recommend spaces around colons in port declarations for better readability.

issues.description: Complex, hard-to-read logic expression should be refactored into intermediate signals
suggestions: Break complex expression into intermediate signals for better readability
Use separate signals for each condition: condition1, condition2, condition3
Refactor to improve maintainability and clarity
issues.reasoning: Complex nested logic expressions with multiple conditions are difficult to read, maintain, and debug. Breaking them into intermediate signals improves code clarity and maintainability.
